experiences.name: QA Tester
experiences.missionShort: Creating test cases, documentation and manual testing
missionLong: Creating test cases, documentation and manual testing

I'm working manually testing the software that our developers creates like websites, mobile apps, propietary software and propietary hardware in order to create the best technological solution for the aquaculture.
My main mission is to write test cases, make documentation for errors, automatation testing and sometimes UX/UI suggestions for improvement on the hardware/software.
